channel.title: [317] it says server is offline, with pictures!
channel.description:
When i compile everything, I recieve no error message, when i run both client and source, again no error messages. So i go to log on and it says, server is offline/no responce from server
[IMG]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/6601/duct.jpg[/img]
everything is running ok
[IMG]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/1167/sucess.jpg[/img]
I port forwarded correctly, it says they can see my ports, from canyouseeme.org
[IMG]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/4329/192zx.jpg[/img]
this is my router showing my server is enabled
[IMG]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/6285/noerrors.jpg[/img]
i get the error message, and my server showing theres no errors
[IMG]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/1852/guinotepad.jpg[/img] my gui showing i changed it to my server
[IMG]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/6601/duct.jpg[/IMG
everything is running ok
Please, if any of you want to request a picture for me to put up I will

item.title: [317] it says server is offline, with pictures!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:2, topic:346138”]Simple problem.

In your client, YOU and ONLY YOU connect from 192.168.2.2 as your ip

EVERYONE ELSE connects with elitenose.no-ip.biz[/quote]

Its not necessarily 192.168.2.2. You can always use localhost, 0.0.0.0, and 127.0.0.1 though.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] it says server is offline, with pictures!
